snippet.title: Whisker Waters - Reveal Trailer 🐱🎣
snippet.description:
Get ready to cast your lines and reel in an adventure of a lifetime! Whisker Waters is sailing onto PC & console, inviting you to create your own Cat character and dive into a world that's part RPG, part fishing paradise.

Features:
🌟 Unique RPG Adventure with a blend of fantasy and fishing.
🎣 Captivating Fishing Mechanics including a variety of tools and techniques.
🐠 Diverse Fish Species to discover; each with unique behaviors.
🎮 Easy to Learn, Challenging to Master: Suitable for all gamers.
🐾 Personalize your Cat character with extensive customization options.

🖤 Wishlist now on Steam: https://bit.ly/45FnfVO 
💙 Wishlist now on PS5: https://bit.ly/3Ps1Dq4

Want to stay up to date? Follow us on socials:
- Website - https://www.mergegames.com/
- Twitter - https://twitter.com/MergeGamesLtd
- Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/MergeGamesLtd
- YouTube - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC8Qkz9-7O3mRu4QUaidgPGg
- Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/mergegamesltd/
- TikTok - https://www.tiktok.com/@mergegamesltd

#steam #nintendo #nintendoswitch #ps5 #ps5games #reveal #whiskerwaters #cats #cute #fishing #indiegame
